name: Gauntlet (itch) (Chrispy)
description:
Credit: griffpatch on Scratch

Made in Scratch. Requires Adobe Flash Player. Download here. 

« CONTROLS »

Player 1-

WASD - Move

SPACE or Q - Shoot

1 - While dead you can change class

Player 2-

ARROW KEYS - Move

SHIFT or ALT - Shoot

2 - While dead you can change class

Universal-

P - Use a potion to clear ememies on screen
